title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.3 - Application review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.3 - Application review

State Regulations

The board shall review each economic development power
application. The board may request additional information from an applicant to
assist in its review. The board's review shall be on the basis of the relative
merits of all applications under consideration in accordance with the
requirements and criteria set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
370.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
